name: Teemo's Tavern
description:
Teemo's Tavern was created under Riot Games' "Legal Jibber Jabber" policy using assets owned by Riot Games.  Riot Games does not endorse or sponsor this project.

Controls 

  • WASD or Arrows keys for movement
  • Space Bar or Left Mouse Button for stab
  • Press R to Restart Game

(PS: Stab only works on Gragus, he are the guys in the VIP area) 

Small mushroom (light green in color)

-Damages you for 5 hp and will be destroyed (Makes you green color)

Big mushroom (Big Mushroom)

-Damages you for 30HP (Makes you blue color)

Alcohol 

-Slows you by 25%. 

Gragus 

-Damages you for 3HP on impact 

 

Teemo had made some hp potions and nontoxic mushrooms to give you!

Hp potion

 - Gives you 10HP.

Big Hp potion

- Gives you 25HP.

Nontoxic mushrooms (dark green in color)

- Cure you for 2 HP won’t be destroyed and increases 10% run speed.

Best of Luck!
